name: aura-break
caption: Aura Break

effect.short: Makes []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types.
effect.full: While this Pokémon is on the field, []{ability:dark-aura} and []{ability:fairy-aura} weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.

flavorText:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed
to lower the power of affected moves.
